sources.title: Fiesta Time (1945)
sources.description: It's Fiesta Time in Mexico, so two little kids and a donkey have fun. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/fiesta-time-1945/

metadata.Plot: It is Fiesta Time in a South American country and a young boy and his donkey are celebrating with a young senorita. The boy has to go to bed but his donkey gets him up and they return to the fiesta to find the senorita, but her father is keeping a watchful eye on her.
metadata.Actors: Frank Graham, Pinto Colvig, Leone Le Doux
